commit.message:
basic_string.tcc (_M_mutate): Don't compute __src unnecessarily.

	    Andrew Pinski  <pinskia@physics.uc.edu>

	* include/bits/basic_string.tcc (_M_mutate): Don't compute
	__src unnecessarily.
